title: Shareable warning-gate entry and copyable share URL

requirements.summary: Add a new initial Warning screen gated by a Continue button before entering the existing 404 → invitation → celebration flow.
acceptanceCriteria: When the app is opened via the dedicated share/warning URL, the Warning screen is the first thing shown.
The Warning screen contains the exact warning sentence: "Open this link at your own risk".
Clicking "Continue" transitions into the existing 404 screen and preserves all existing interactions/animations afterward.

file_operations.description: Create a WarningGate UI component that renders the exact warning text and a "Continue" button, styled to match the existing pastel card aesthetic (reuse existing utility classes like card-container, rounded edges, subtle shadows, smooth transitions). Use the shadcn-ui Button component for actions. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Wire the new Warning screen into the existing screen-state flow by adding a 'warning' screen state and conditional rendering with the same transition patterns used by existing screens. On load, detect the dedicated warning URL fragment/segment and start on the Warning screen; on Continue, transition to the existing '404' screen without changing subsequent behaviors/animations.

requirements.summary: Implement a shareable Warning URL format and show a copyable share link with clear copy success/failure feedback.
acceptanceCriteria: The app can derive a "share link" at runtime from the current window location (origin + path) plus the chosen fragment/segment for the Warning screen.
The UI shows the full share link as text and provides a "Copy" button that copies it to the clipboard.
Copy action provides clear success/failure feedback in the UI (English text).

file_operations.description: Add a small React hook that derives the full share URL at runtime from window.location (origin + pathname) plus the chosen Warning fragment/segment, and exposes a copy-to-clipboard action with success/failure status for UI feedback.

Display the derived full share link as visible text and add a "Copy" button that triggers the copy-to-clipboard action, showing clear success/failure feedback text in English. Use the shadcn-ui Button component for the copy action (and any secondary action button styling). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Ensure the chosen URL fragment/segment for the Warning screen is consistently used for (1) initial Warning-screen detection and (2) derived share-link generation in the Warning/share UI.

requirements.summary: Ensure all new Warning/share UI strings are English and styling matches the existing soft pastel design system.
acceptanceCriteria: All new UI strings are English.
Warning/share UI visually matches the existing design system (typography, rounded cards, shadows, transitions).

file_operations.description: Audit and enforce that all user-facing strings added for the Warning/share UI are English-only, and apply existing design utilities (card-container, rounded corners, subtle shadows, smooth transitions) so the new UI matches the current pastel aesthetic.

Ensure the Warning screen is rendered with the same layout/typography conventions as existing screens (centered container, card styling, transitions), without modifying any read-only shadcn/ui component files.
